Insurance Do’s
& Don’ts You
Need To Know Related Reads

Fund: Why Yo…
PERSONAL
FINANCE
Grow Your
Savings With i…
Making the right insurance
choice is key to protecting
your financial future. Always
choose a policy that suits your
needs, review the terms
carefully, update your agent
on any major changes, and
consider extra coverage if
needed.
Avoid common mistakes like
skipping basic protection,
buying without research, or
neglecting policy reviews.
These simple do’s and don’ts
can help you and your family
stay financially prepared for
life’s uncertainties.
Start protecting
your future today
EPF offers the Member
Protection Plan via the iLindung platform, designed
to make it easier for you and
your family members to
purchase EPF-endorsed
insurance or takaful products.
You can choose affordable
life and/or critical illness
coverage, with yearly
premiums deducted directly
from your Akaun Sejahtera
(for members under 55) or
Akaun Emas (for members
aged 55 and above).
Conveniently, you can apply
through the KWSP i-Akaun
app!
